original_text: So Peter and John went into the city. They found everything that Jesus had told them about. So they prepared the Passover meal.
korean_text: 그들이 나가 그 하신 말씀대로 만나 유월절을 준비하니라

sentences.original_text: So Peter and John went into the city.
that Jesus had told them about.
So they prepared the Passover meal.
